summary: Music critic Robert Palmer narrates the insightful story of Delta blues and North Mississippi hill country blues.
cast: Robert Palmer|David A. Stewart|Abraham Schwab|Booker T. Laury|R.L. Burnside|Jessie Mae Hemphill|Abe Young|Napoleon Strickland|Junior Kimbrough|Joe Ayers|Calvin Jackson|Roosevelt Barnes|Frank Self|Wade Walton|Big Jack Johnson|Jack Owens|Early Wright|Bud Spires|Lonnie Pitchford
title: Deep Blues
